amendment.description: An amendment numbered 11 printed in Part B of House Report 116-383 to clarify that credit reports cannot be used solely as the reason for denial of employment.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 11 printed in Part B of House Report 116-383 to clarify that credit reports cannot be used solely as the reason for denial of employment.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cohen amendment (A011) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A011) offered by Mr. Cohen.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Cohen amendment (A011) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
